say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Examples

Examples and tests for good measure.

{% raw %} 
say_hello("Sylvain")

'Hello Sylvain!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
""" a simple test hereeee """
assert say_hello("Jeremy")=="Hello Jeremy!"

""" would fail:
assert say_hello("Kastan")=="Hello loser!"
"""

' would fail:\nassert say_hello("Kastan")=="Hello loser!"\n'
{% endraw %}
